entry.def: When you masticate food, you chew it.

example.ex: Her mouth was working, as if she was masticating some tasty titbit...
example.tran: 她的嘴在动，好像在嚼什么好吃的。

example.ex: Don't gulp everything down without masticating.
example.tran: 不要不加咀嚼就把什么都给一股脑地吞下去。

means.word_mean: 1. biting and grinding food in your mouth so it becomes soft enough to swallow
